dict.string:
Prevents the lockscreen from waking/showing whenever new notifications are received. This will prevent unnecessary battery drain by preventing the screen from lighting up.
I titled this patch "IllLookLater" since it does similar to that tweak but I have no affiliation.
[v.1] Tested with an iPad mini 4 on 10.2. (2-5-17)
â˜žPayPal: goin730@gmail.com
LS - IllLookLater (Prevent Screen Waking When Receiving New Notifications)
